description: Name for the traffic policy. Must begin with an ASCII alphanumeric or underscore (_) character, and must contain only ASCII alphanumeric, underscore, hash (#), period (.), space, colon (:), at (@), equals (=), and hyphen (-) characters. Cannot be changed after the policy is created.
The following requirement applies only to the Citrix ADC CLI:
If the name includes one or more spaces, enclose the name in double or single quotation marks (for example, "my policy" or 'my policy').
Name of the Citrix ADC named expression, or an expression, that the policy uses to determine whether to apply certain action on the current traffic.
Name of the action to apply to requests or connections that match this policy.
